mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COST_DETAIL ( cost_id, create_time, cost_time, create_user_id, cost_type, cost_class, cost_subtype_id, cost_num, dep_id, remark, status, cost_no, contract_id, project_id , travel_id ) VALUES ( #{costId}, #{createTime}, #{costTime}, #{createUserId}, #{costType}, #{costClass}, #{costSubtypeId}, #{costNum}, #{depId}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{costNo}, #{contractId}, #{projectId}, #{travelId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COST_DETAIL SET cost_time = #{costTime}, cost_type = #{costType}, cost_subtype_id = #{costSubtypeId}, cost_num = #{costNum}, remark = #{remark}, status = #{status}, contract_id = #{contractId}, project_id = #{projectId} WHERE cost_id = #{costId}
mapper.select: SELECT type,date,seq FROM COST_SEQ WHERE Type = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO COST_SEQ ( type, date, seq ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{date}, #{seq} )
mapper.select: SELECT cost_id AS costId, create_time AS createTime, cost_time AS costTime, create_user_id AS createUserId, cost_type AS costType, cost_subtype_id AS costSubtypeId, cost_num AS costNum, dep_id AS depId, remark AS remark FROM COST_DETAIL WHERE cost_id = #{_parameter}
SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(cost_time,'%Y-%m') AS month FROM COST_DETAIL

SELECT a.cost_id AS costId, a.cost_dep AS costDep, b.name AS costDepName, a.cost_year AS costYear, a.cost_month AS costMonth, a.cost_date AS costDate, a.cost_num AS costNum FROM COST_DEP_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT b on a.cost_dep = b.dep_id WHERE cost_id = #{_parameter} order by b.order,b.name

SELECT dep.`name` AS depName, costSub.`name` AS costSubName, costDetail.cost_id AS costId, costDetail.cost_num AS costNum, costDetail.cost_time AS costTime, costDetail.cost_type AS costType, costDetail.cost_subtype_id AS costSubtypeId, costDetail.cost_class as costClass, costDetail.create_time AS createTime, costDetail.remark as remark, costDetail.cost_no as costNo, costDetail.status, costDetail.audit_user as auditUser, audit.realname AS auditUserName, costDetail.create_user_id AS subUser, subUser.realname as subUserName, code.content as statusName, 'view' as editMode, costDetail.contract_id as contractId, contract.content as contractContent, costDetail.project_id as projectId, project.name as projectName FROM COST_DETAIL costDetail LEFT JOIN COST_SUBTYPE costSub ON costDetail.cost_subtype_id = costSub.cost_subtype_id LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT dep ON costDetail.dep_id = dep.dep_id LEFT JOIN CODE_CONTENT code on costDetail.status = code.id and codeName = 'CodeStatus' LEFT JOIN ADMIN_USER audit on costDetail.audit_user = audit.user_id LEFT JOIN ADMIN_USER subUser on costDetail.create_user_id = subUser.user_id LEFT JOIN CONTRACT contract on costDetail.contract_id = contract.contract_id LEFT JOIN project on costDetail.project_id = project.pj_no where 1=1
AND costDetail.cost_type = #{map.costType}
AND costDetail.cost_subtype_id = #{map.costSubtypeId}
AND costDetail.cost_no like '%${map.costNo}%'
AND costDetail.remark like '%${map.remark}%'
AND (costDetail.status in ('03','04','05'))
AND (costDetail.status = '03')
AND (costDetail.status = '05')
AND costDetail.dep_id = #{map.depId} AND (costDetail.status in ('01','02','03','04','05'))
AND costDetail.dep_id = #{map.depId} AND (costDetail.status in ('01','04'))
AND costDetail.dep_id = #{map.depId} AND (costDetail.status in ('03','02','05'))
AND costDetail.cost_time >= #{map.startTime}
AND costDetail.cost_time <= #{map.endTime}
ORDER BY costDetail.create_time DESC
